channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Effective Fraud Prevention Is A Growth Strategy
item.description: Cross-functional fraud prevention is effective fraud prevention, and effective fraud prevention drives company growth.
